div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 12 Athens (Acropolis), 1886 (96) Burial: 479-478 B.C. (K) Contents: 63 AR. From excavation of "Perserschutt" Athens: 17 Wappenm. (all wheel type, 1 dr.; 14 ob.; 2 hemiob.) 36 early tetradr. (unwreathed owls) 9 early fr. (1 dr.; 8 ob.) 1 tetradr. (wreathed owl, con- sidered intrusive by Svoronos and others) Disposition: Athens † Svoronos, JIAN 1898, pp. 367-78, illus.; Athènes, pl. 3 (54 coins illus.) Babelon, Traité II.1, pp. 766 ff., illus. Seltman, Athens, p. 147 Kraay, NC 1956, p. 53; 1962, pp. 418-9 Wallace, NC 1962, pp. 34-5 Starr, Athenian Coinage, pp. 3-6, 87
